results.title: An MRI pattern of metformin-associated encephalopathy in hemodialysis.

results.title: Focal brain lactate accumulation in metformin-induced encephalopathy without systemic lactic acidosis: A case report suggesting mitochondrial vulnerability in lentiform fork sign
results.text_hl: These radiological findings were very similar to previous reports of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@encephalopathy@@@ with lentiform fork sign.

results.title: Case Report: A Case of Encephalopathy Presenting the Lentiform Fork Sign on MRI in a Diabetic Dialysis Patient
results.text_hl: Thus, the @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@encephalopathy@@@ was considered to be related to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment.

results.title: Metformin Improves Functional Outcomes, Activates Neural Precursor Cells, and Modulates Microglia in a Sex-Dependent Manner After Spinal Cord Injury
results.text_hl: Studies have shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces microglia activation in the @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@brain@@@ following @DISEASE_Wounds_and_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D014947 @@@injury@@@.

results.title: Metformin decelerates aging clock in male monkeys.
results.text_hl: The results highlighted a significant slowing of aging indicators, notably a roughly 6-year regression in @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@brain aging@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ exerts a substantial neuroprotective effect, preserving brain structure and enhancing cognitive ability.

results.title: Lentiform fork sign in a uremic patient after inadvertent exposure to metformin.
results.text_hl: Clinicians should be aware of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@encephalopathy@@@, presenting with relevant medication history, @DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological symptoms@@@, and the lentiform fork sign.

results.title: Metformin: A Growing Journey from Glycemic Control to the Treatment of Alzheimer's Disease and Depression.
results.text_hl: Current studies imply that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could play a neuroprotective role by reversing hallmarks of @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D001930 @@@brain injury@@@ (@DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic dysfunction@@@, @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@neuronal dystrophy@@@ and cellular loss), in addition to cognitive and behavioral alterations that accompany the onset of certain @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@brain diseases@@@ such as @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@) and @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@.

citations.NLM: El Massry M, Alaeddine LM, Ali L, Saad C, Eid AA. Metformin: A Growing Journey from Glycemic Control to the Treatment of Alzheimer's Disease and Depression. Curr Med Chem. 2021;28(12):2328-2345. PMID: 32900343
citations.BibTeX: @article{32900343, title={Metformin: A Growing Journey from Glycemic Control to the Treatment of Alzheimer's Disease and Depression.}, author={El Massry M and Alaeddine LM and Ali L and Saad C and Eid AA}, journal={Curr Med Chem}, volume={28}, number={12}, pages={2328-2345}}
